name: Bad Friday
description:
* NOTE: It's a little broken. The bunnies are supposed to fight back and the final boss is indeed supposed to die when his health reaches zero. I can't make changes during the jam period so I'll upload a fixed version afterwards.

Help a bunny get his revenge in this doom-inspired, Easter-themed first person shooter.

Controls:
  • 1 and 2 to switch weapons
  • P to pause
  • R to reload
  • Right to block (with yer fists)
  • Options such as volume and mouse sensitivity can be changed in the pause menu (P)

If the WebGL version isn't working for whatever reason, try downloading the Windows .exe version below!

This game was made in one week for the Easter Hunt Jam 2022! It was a lot of fun to make, and a great learning experience. All of the assets were created during the jam period (huge thanks to Shreybae (@shreyba.e on instagram) for making the title screen and story art as well as a lot of the sprites!) Thank you for playing!
